original_text: But if they return to me and they obey my commands, I will be kind to them. I will bring them back together again from all the different places where they are living. Even if they live far away, I will find them. I will bring them to the place that I have chosen to give honour to my name.”
korean_text: 만일 내게로 돌아와 내 계명을 지켜 행하면 너희 쫓긴 자가 하늘 끝에 있을지라도 내가 거기서부터 그들을 모아 내 이름을 두려고 택한 곳에 돌아오게 하리라 하신 말씀을 이제 청하건대 기억하옵소서

sentences.original_text: But if they return to me
I will be kind to them
I will bring them back together again
from all the different places where they are living
Even if they live far away
I will bring them to the place
to give honour to my name
sentences.korean_translation: 내 이름에 영광을 주기 위한 곳으로
